alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wilson and southeastern Bexar Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calaveras Lake, or 10 miles east of Stinson Municipal Airport, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Stinson Municipal Airport, Leon Valley, Elmendorf, China Grove, Lackland AFB, Calaveras Lake, Sandy Oaks, Balcones Heights, Buena Vista, Mitchell Lake, Parita, Losoya, Southton, Canada Verde, Sayers, Thelma, Brooks City Base, and Braunig Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
